message: Let's split the money evenly. We both stand to lose value over time due to inflation, so it makes sense to divide it equally now.
You're starting high, I'll try to meet you in the middle
I've adjusted my offer to meet closer to Bob's suggestion. I propose we divide the money with a slight advantage for you, acknowledging the risk of inflation.
You're getting closer, but I'm still not ready to accept. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I want to keep the majority
I appreciate your willingness to compromise. This offer splits the difference more evenly, reflecting a balanced approach to the risk of inflation.
